'''''"He Never Dies"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|"He Never Dies"|text="He Never Dies" â€” Dragon Defier}} without being hit by "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision."

Preventing "He Never Dies" from using "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision" will count towards the achievement. If the charging is not interrupted, the player will have to dodge the attack instead.
